name: AGRISTRATEGY SPRL
goal: To help agribusiness companies improve their understanding of the policy context that impact their businesses and strategies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Information Society, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- Common Agricultural Policy (CAP)
- Pesticides regulation (Registration and Sustainable Use Directive)
- Environment & Trade (Maximum Residue Limits)
- GMO's (import and cultivation approvals)
- Council Regulation (EC) No 479/2008 of 29 April 2008 on the common organisation of the market in wine products.
